ygData.msgSnippet: (OOC: Sorry, I ve been lost lately, since school started, and things have been happening) ... Astral growled as Dark One took off.  Oh well.  Astral stumbled

(OOC: Sorry, I've been lost lately, since school started, and things have
been happening)

::Lavacons::

         Astral growled as Dark One took off.  Oh well.  Astral stumbled
back on the ground as he was hit by DevilDuer returning fire.

     "Foolish Alliance warrior!!!! The Maximals mean JACK to me!!!!!!  Now,
I correct you, I am Admiral Astral of the LAVACONS!!!!  I didn't come to
Earth to fight inferior transformers like you, but if I must, then you will
die, I won't allow anyone to stop me and my crew from finishing this
experiment!!!" Astral screamed in rage, and continued blasting shots from
his machine gun at DevilDuer, putting his pistol away.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Fenox got hit once by Hiss in the right shoulder, then in the left, and then
in the chest, going backwards from each shot.  Then, two of Scavanger's
shots hit Fenox, and he goes spiraling down to the ground, unconscious as he
hit the ground.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Starlight did a somersault in the air towards Breakdown, dodging his shots,
then landing and firing her crossbow at him again.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Griplash put his arms in front of him, to try to block a couple shots.  The
shots hit him, and he went back, but, at the last shot, went flying back.

    "Ah!!  Stupid Oblitercon!!" Griplash yelled, getting up, jumping in the
air and going for Pyro with his lava blade.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Recklessa sees that Dark One has sped away.

    "Ok, my fun just got SPOILED!!!!!!  AND I HATE IT WHEN THAT
HAPPENS!!!!!" She said.

      Suddenly, she saw Fenox go down.

      "I ALSO FORGOT TO MENTION, THAT NOBODY ATTACKS THE BOT I
LIKE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!" She shouted, firing her gatling guns at Hiss and
Scavanger like crazy.

(Ok, and just in case you ask for Scavanger, Fenox was the only one
airborne)
----- Original Message -----
From: <Yanshosh@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, September 26, 2000 9:43 PM
Subject: Re: Decadel, the Lavacons


> Dark One is well away from the battle, Dcoburn.
>
> ::DevilDuer/The Oblitercons::
>
> DevilDuer yells as shots hit his side, the Alliance member diving down and
> rollinig onthe ground. He jumps up, growling at the bot that had shot him.
>
> "I'm warning you, Maximal. If your troops don't get the pit off our
territory
> right now, the Alliance is going to attack the Ark, and crush your puny
> faction."
>
> He fires a few shots at Astral.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> A shot barely hits Breakdown, the HUMVEE spinning around, aiming all three
> machine guns at Starlight and firing.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Seeing a bot coming toward him, Pyro transforms into beast mode, firing at
> Griplash.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Hiss jumps out of the way, a shot hitting Scavanger.
>
> His flies into the air, firing rapidly at Fenox while Scavanger transforms
> into artillery mode, firing at all the airborne Lavacons.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> "My name's Dark One," Dark One replies, speeding toward the base. He could
> now see it.
>
> Soon, he'd be able to drop this femm off and return to the battle....
>
>
>
>
